messages.message: There was a problem while reading the XML configuration file ('%(path_to_xml)s')
'%(xml_tag_name)s' tag is missing in the XML configuration file ('%(path_to_xml)s')
The tag attribute '%(xml_tag_attr)s' cannot be empty in '%(path_to_xml)s'
The tag '%(xml_tag_name)s' cannot be empty in '%(path_to_xml)s'
The query context '%(xpath_query_context)s' is not defined in '%(path_to_xml)s'
